CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Street__c), "", Street__c) + IF(ISBLANK(AddresNumber__c), "", ", " + AddresNumber__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Neighborhood__c), "", ", " + Neighborhood__c) + IF(ISBLANK(City__c), "", ", " + City__c) + IF(ISBLANK(State__c), "", ", " + State__c) + IF(ISBLANK(CEP__c), "", ", " + CEP__c) + IF(ISBLANK(ReferencePoint__c), "", ", " + ReferencePoint__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Complement__c), "", ", " + Complement__c)
CustomField.label: Endere√ßo
